name: Machine Transporter Truck Parking
description:
Machine Transporter Truck Parking

People who love to drive the artistically designed Monster trucks for Machine transport gets ready to play Machine Transporter Truck Parking.

In this game you try & prove your Real driving simulation skills by moving various kind of Cargo from one place to another Place (parking) successfully.

So get ready for the king of all Truck transporter games truck driving games, in the modern truck transporter. Now shift gears like a real Truck driver.But here is different of Jumbo Truck TRANSPORTER BIG TRUCK .

Machine Transporter Truck is one of the best Truck Driving Simulation games. if you can play all level then you can be hero of world Truck driver. this game is waiting only for you ... !!


How To Play:

1. Gear is for forward and reverse.
2. Brake button is on the left side of the accelerator.
3. Steering is on the left bottom side of the screen.
4. if any help contact us .

Key Features :

=> Amazing sound effects.
=> Awesome driving controls of truck
=> Amazing Different different Road Map track
=> Challenge your truck driving skills
=> Extreme turns with Easy controller
=> Many Various Type of Truck
